title.narrative: Strengthening cooperation among Commonwealth member states to tackle the illicit proliferation of conventional weapons

description.narrative:
The project, funded by the FCO and implemented in partnership with the FCO and the Small Arms Survey, is designed to improve national implementation of international conventional arms control obligations. The project aims to strengthen cooperation in tackling the implementation challenges facing Commonwealth member countries, sharing information on resources available within and outside the Commonwealth and providing tools for practical capacity building projects. This will assist Commonwealth member countries in meeting Sustainable Development Goal 16, Target 4, aimed at achieving significant reductions of illicit arms by 2030.
The project will include the creation of an online platform for Commonwealth member countries to exchange knowledge, experience and expertise; capacity building in order to strengthen counter-proliferation capacity; and encouraging the effective participation of Commonwealth member countries in international decision-making process.
